meanings.sent1: I always make sure to undersign important papers.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to undersign the contract before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried undersigning the letter with its paw, leaving ink marks everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the undersigning of her happiness.
meanings.sent5: Undersigning the agreement felt like sealing a promise.

meanings.definition: To sign one's name at the end of a document.
meanings.sent1: After reading the letter, she carefully undersigned her name.
meanings.sent2: He undersigned the check before handing it over.
meanings.sent3: The robot insisted on undersigning its name in binary code.
meanings.sent4: The sunset undersigned the end of a beautiful day.
meanings.sent5: Undersigning his name felt like leaving a mark on history.

meanings.definition: To formally agree to something by signing a document.
meanings.sent1: By undersigning the contract, we commit to the terms.
meanings.sent2: The CEO undersigned the merger agreement with a flourish.
meanings.sent3: The penguin comically attempted undersigning the treaty with a flipper.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm undersigned the beginning of a new season.
meanings.sent5: Undersigning the pact felt like a solemn vow.
